name: Shien's Revenge [SNES]
description: Shien's Revenge, known in Japan as Shien: The Blade Chaser (紫炎～ザ・ブレイドチェイサー, Shien za Bureido Cheeisaa), is an action game released for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in 1994. It was the first video game designed by the famous manga and anime artist Go Nagai.
